scripts.test: watchify -t [reactify --es6] -t es6ify -t -g uglifyify src/test/test.js -o test/test.js -dv | mocha -w
scripts.build-test: npm run build | npm run test
scripts.build-deploy: npm run build | npm run deploy
scripts.old-build-test: watchify -t [reactify --es6] -t es6ify -t -g uglifyify src/booking/manage/main.js -o build/booking/manage/main.min.js -dv | watchify -t [reactify --es6] -t es6ify src/test/test.js -o test/test.js -v | mocha -w
scripts.old-build: watchify -t [reactify --es6] -t es6ify src/booking/manage/main.js -o build/booking/manage/main.js -dv | watchify -g uglifyify build/booking/manage/main.js -o build/booking/manage/main.min.js -dv
